title: Cafe Kuchen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A certified organic cafe offers a daily vegan soup, vegetarian lunch (Mon-Fri), vegan salad, porridge, in-house-made vegan cake, ice sorbet, soymilk for organic coffee and more. Family-friendly - has a play area and a baby's changing table. Plays world music. Cooks no meat in the kitchen; heat it separately. Uses no microwave, is eco-friendly. Daily newspapers and magazines and a book-crossing area are available.
